Item ID6577

An onyx necklace is a necklace made by using a gold bar, an onyx, and a necklace mould on a furnace. This requires 82 Crafting and yields 120 Crafting experience.

An onyx necklace can be enchanted into a berserker necklace with the Lvl-6 Enchant standard spell which requires 87 Magic, a cosmic rune, 20 earth runes, and 20 fire runes.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The gold bar used to make this turns the same colour as the Onyx.
  • The onyx necklace looks similar to the Beads of the dead obtained in the Shilo Village quest.
